projects.name: Calendery
projects.description: A full-stack scheduling application for managing events and appointments. Built using React.js for the frontend and Node.js with Express for the backend, demonstrating user-centric design and API integration.
features: Full-stack development with RESTful API integration
Backend development with Node.js and Express

projects.name: Apple-Scab-App
projects.description: A deep learning-based application designed to detect apple scab diseases on apple leaves using image classification. The app uses a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) model trained on a dataset of apple leaves for accurate disease detection and classification.
features: Image classification using CNN for apple scab detection
Preprocessing of apple leaf images for better model accuracy
User-friendly interface for uploading leaf images
Integration with backend API for real-time results

projects.name: Tascade
projects.description: XATA-T2G is a task management app developed for the Teach2give program. It enables efficient management of tasks, assignments, and progress tracking for learning platforms. The app is built to streamline task organization and collaboration between students, teachers, and administrators.
features: User roles and permissions for students, teachers, and admins
Collaborative environment for managing learning tasks
Notifications for task deadlines and updates
